name: Beginner Flutter Quiz
description: A set of questions for Flutter beginners
author: WSBT

questions.title: What language is Flutter written in?
What is the starting point for all Flutter apps?
How can you create a Material Design app in Flutter?
candidates: Select Material Design when creating the project
Create a new project with --material-design flag

questions.title: What is a widget in Flutter?
answers: A type of UI building block
candidates: An interactive component on home screen

questions.title: How to update the state in a StatefulWidget?
The config file `pubspec.yaml` can be used to define:
answers: the name and version of your app

questions.title: What method would you use to run code when a `Future` has completed?
What is the Hot Reload feature in Flutter?
answers: It allows for instant updates after code changes
candidates: It speeds up the app launching process
It cools down the CPU after executing long computations
It pushes new app versions (app updates) to users

questions.title: Which controller is closely related to capturing user inputs?
How do you handle async operations in Flutter?
